name: Arani-1H
description:
Crash landed on a planet called Arani-1H, you must find a way to repair your ship and escape the planet alive.

Arani-1H is a 2D adventure platformer game made in Unity by two game development students from Finland, with help in music and sounds.

Creators:

Topi Volanen - topi.volanen@gmail.com

Mortaza Mohebby - morteza123@hotmail.fi
